location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushere [Bushire], to Peter Elwin Wrench, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter relays the claim made by Narrotam Josee [Narottam Ramachandar Joshi], the Company's broker in Muscat, that it was Julfar Arabs (al-QawƒÅsim) that plundered the tranky he sent to Bushire, not himself.
